snippet.title: Cool Pizza
snippet.description:
APP STORE LINK: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/cool-pizza/id541666625?ls=1&mt=8

A girl and her haunted skateboard dive through the depths of the underworld, fighting devils and looking for answers. Can pizza ever be cool? 

Cool Pizza is a spastic screen-masher inspired by Space Harrier and After Burner. 

**COOL PIZZA CAN ONLY BE PLAYED ON DEVICES WITH A RETINA SCREEN** 

Brutal difficulty 
Forty-two Waves 
Original laptoppunk soundtrack by Tettix 
Game Center leaderboards and achievements 
Unleashes the T.R.U.E. power of the iPhone 
Four dazzling colors [black not actually a color]
